summary: Adds a retextured guard\'s shield in the form of a medieval crusader\'s buckler
descriptionHtml:
I have a few crusader mods installed just for role playing purposes and lacked a certain footsoldier shield which I thought retexture myself to fill this little gap. 

I came up with this little shield retexture and also decided to share.

It can be found outside the Temple of Talos which is the closest thing to a church in Skyrim.

This could simply be used for footsoldiers or perhaps your prime, favorite shield.

Texture does need work and is a bit bright... also needs a normal map thing..

Its standalone and does not replace any vanilla texture.
author: Beth
